body_html:
@yangl326-Dylan
Looks like I posted about 2 years back - so, I don't remember exactly.
What I think I did at that time was to convert it to a regression problem instead of a classification - that was possible in my case. I don't think it would be an option for everyone.
I couldn't get the cast and arg_max gradients to work - but I didn't dig deeper since I was chasing a deadline and was short on time. Thanks!

@yangl326-Dylan 
Looks like I posted about 2 years back - so, I don't remember exactly. 
What I think I did at that time was to convert it to a regression problem instead of a classification - that was possible in my case. I don't think it would be an option for everyone. 
I couldn't get the cast and arg_max gradients to work - but I didn't dig deeper since I was chasing a deadline and was short on time. Thanks!
